text: Proficiency in reading dual-stain cytology can be achieved faster than for Pap cytology, and reproducibility of dual-stain cytology results is higher than that of cytology.Being a cytological method needing specific laboratory infrastructure, dual-stain cytology cannot be implemented as a point-of-care test, but can be implemented in centralized, high-standard laboratories that serve multiple screening sites.
